page.title: 12A DAY IN THE LIFE...
page.content: On Thursday morning my alarm goes off at 7.30 I get up and get dressed. When I'm down stairs I wait for my dad to come in.When he comes down stairs we take the dustbins down to the end of the drive. When we get back in the house we have our breakfast. I finish mine about 8.15. After that I go up stairs to clean my teeth. When dads finished in the bathroom he takes me to school. At nine o clock we go into school and have assembly. At 9.30 we do our work. We usually do maths till 10.35 and have break till 11.00 then come in and usually do primary english till 11.55 then wash our hands for dinner. After that we have lunch break till 1.00. Then we do some more work till 2.15 we come in at 2.45 and tidy up.Then we have story and come home. (Written by a 9 year old boy).
